name: Community OAuth APIs - CN
title: Community OAuth APIs - CN
description:
China-specific endpoints for accounts and other community data.

**Hosts**: note that Blizzard API request paths in China follow this format: `https://gateway.battlenet.com.cn` and that OAuth requests in China use `www.battlenet.com.cn/{API path}`. For more information, see the [Getting Started guide](/documentation/guides/getting-started).

User Info (header).description: Returns basic information about the user associated with the current bearer token.

Authorization.description: The user's bearer token. The OAuth 2.0 spec requires the Authorization header be formatted as "Bearer {token}", where {token} is the alpha-numeric authorization token returned by a previous OAuth grant flow.

User Info (param).description: This request is the same as *User Info (header)* but uses a search parameter in the URL rather than an HTTP header. While HTTPS encrypts traffic between the requester and Blizzard's servers at the TCP/IP layer, search parameters are inherently less secure than HTTP headers because they can be logged, copy-pasted, and otherwise easily accessed. As such, we strongly encourage users to put bearer tokens in headers.

Season Index.description: Returns an index of available seasons.

Season.description: Returns a leaderboard list for the specified season.

:id.description: The season for the leaderboard list; get a list of seasons with `GET /data/d3/season/`.
The season for the leaderboard list; get a list of seasons with `GET /data/d3/season/`.

:leaderboard.description: The leaderboard to retrieve; get a list of  leaderboards with `GET /data/d3/season/:id`.

Era Index.description: Returns an index of available eras.

Era.description: Returns a leaderboard list for a particular era.

:id.description: The era to retrieve; get a list of eras with `/GET data/d3/era/`.

Era Leaderboard.description: Returns the specified leaderboard for the specified era.

:id.description: The era for the leaderboard; get a list of eras with `GET /data/d3/era/`.

:leaderboard.description: The leaderboard to retrieve; get a list of leaderboards with `GET /data/d3/era/:id`.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.
